data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Pemba North that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pemba North, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Pemba North, Tanzania a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Pemba North words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Pemba North who will make disciples who make disciples.
Jesus, I pray that all the Kutu people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kutu people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kutu people is yours.
God, we pray for the believers in Pemba North, Tanzania that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Pemba North, Tanzania to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Pemba North, Tanzania a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Pemba North
